name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stanza AI: ChatGPT AI Gmail Writing Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use OpenAI GPT language model AI directly in your Gmail 🤖 Save time and improve your communicaiton for every email you write 📝

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stanza AI is an AI-powered writing assistant powered by OpenAI's GPT and ChatGPT, that offers a convenient and efficient way to generate email drafts right in your Gmail. The tool appears directly in Gmail so you can quickly breeze through that long list of emails you've been meaning to get to. 

Getting started with Stanza AI is easy! Follow these simple steps to start generating email drafts with the power of GPT:

📥 Install Stanza AI from the Chrome Webstore.

🆕 Create a FREE account on https://www.stanza-ai.com.

📧 Open Gmail and compose a new message.

🤖 Click the 'AI Draft Button' located in the bottom right corner of the message window.

🎯 Write a short description of what you want to communicate in your message.

📏 Choose the desired length and tone of your message.

🚀 Click 'Generate' and let the AI do the work for you.

📝 Refine your draft as needed in collaboration with GPT.

💌 Send your message with confidence, knowing that it is clear and effective.

With Stanza AI, you can save time and produce high-quality email content with ease. So why wait? Install Stanza AI today and start generating email drafts like a pro!
